attributes.action: Shoot dead all convicted peadophiles and child mollestors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the paedo's from attacking again. I propose that all convicted paedophiles and kiddie fiddlers should be shot dead!

Why should other innocent children be at risk? Why should our tax pay for a free hotel for these criminals?

You know what to do!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
